raw_response:
{
  "quarterly_updates": "Replaced legacy quarterly revenue inputs with refreshed FY23–FY25 data aligned to the new three-segment structure. Annual consolidated revenues for each fiscal year were allocated evenly across quarters and segments as a simplifying assumption, with all updated quarterly inputs hardcoded in blue.",
  "revbuild_segmentation_updates": "Legacy revenue lines were mapped into three new segments (Content Creation & Distribution, Audience Engagement, Consumer Products). RevBuild Calcs was updated so each segment now aggregates directly from the revised Quarterly sheet, preserving existing roll-up logic and avoiding manual plugs.",
  "financial_statements_updates": "P&L and BS & CFS were refreshed by flowing the updated RevBuild outputs through FS Calcs. Revenue, gross profit, EBITDA, and cash flow lines now reflect the new segmentation while maintaining existing cost, depreciation, working capital, and balance sheet mechanics.",
  "output_summary_updates": "Output and Summary sheets were updated to pull through the refreshed FY23–FY25 results, ensuring reported revenue, EBITDA, leverage, and cash flow metrics reconcile to the updated financial statements.",
  "model_integrity_checks": "Verified that total revenue equals the sum of new segments, P&L net income flows correctly into retained earnings, cash balances reconcile across BS & CFS, and debt schedules tie to ending balances without hard-coded balancing items.",
  "reasoning_steps": [
    "Step 1: Mapped legacy revenue categories into the new three-segment framework and aligned Quarterly inputs to consolidated FY23–FY25 totals.",
    "Step 2: Validated the updated model by checking segment roll-ups, statement linkages, and balance sheet and cash flow reconciliation."
  ]
}

parsed_response.quarterly_updates: Replaced legacy quarterly revenue inputs with refreshed FY23–FY25 data aligned to the new three-segment structure. Annual consolidated revenues for each fiscal year were allocated evenly across quarters and segments as a simplifying assumption, with all updated quarterly inputs hardcoded in blue.
parsed_response.revbuild_segmentation_updates: Legacy revenue lines were mapped into three new segments (Content Creation & Distribution, Audience Engagement, Consumer Products). RevBuild Calcs was updated so each segment now aggregates directly from the revised Quarterly sheet, preserving existing roll-up logic and avoiding manual plugs.
parsed_response.financial_statements_updates: P&L and BS & CFS were refreshed by flowing the updated RevBuild outputs through FS Calcs. Revenue, gross profit, EBITDA, and cash flow lines now reflect the new segmentation while maintaining existing cost, depreciation, working capital, and balance sheet mechanics.
parsed_response.output_summary_updates: Output and Summary sheets were updated to pull through the refreshed FY23–FY25 results, ensuring reported revenue, EBITDA, leverage, and cash flow metrics reconcile to the updated financial statements.
parsed_response.model_integrity_checks: Verified that total revenue equals the sum of new segments, P&L net income flows correctly into retained earnings, cash balances reconcile across BS & CFS, and debt schedules tie to ending balances without hard-coded balancing items.
reasoning_steps: Step 1: Mapped legacy revenue categories into the new three-segment framework and aligned Quarterly inputs to consolidated FY23–FY25 totals.
Step 2: Validated the updated model by checking segment roll-ups, statement linkages, and balance sheet and cash flow reconciliation.
